sections.description:
Comment Approved Notifier sends an e-mail to your commenters when you approve their comments. It is a very simple plugin. There are no settings, options. It starts to work when you activate it.

Read Please

If you upgraded to WP 2.7 or WP 2.8, please, update v1.1 to v2.1
It requires at least 2.7. If you use WP 2.6.5, please use version 1.1

Thanks!
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Download the zip file and extract the contents.
  2. Upload the ‘comment-approved-notifier’ folder or ‘comment-approved-notifier.php’ to your plugins directory (wp-content/plugins/).
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘plugins’ page in WordPress.
  4. That is all.
sections.faq:
How can I change the message which is sent?

You have to edit plugin and change $message variable.
